name: Angels
desc: Also known as Heavenly envoys, their primary duties were to help people. They were later expelled from Celestia and consequently lost their bodies and minds.

customize.name: Primordial One
customize.desc: The First Descender, who defeated seven Dragon Sovereigns of the world and created people. The Primordial One may be Phanes.

customize.text:
The Heavenly Principles created angels from light itself. The silver wings of the angels shimmered like moonlit flames, their heads were adorned with crowns of sevenfold radiance, and their names were the love promised to all creatures by the heavenly god, or the power over all the peoples of the earth. The angels were the most faithful servants in the heavenly court and envoys to the people who prospered under their protection.
After the war with the invaders from beyond the skies, the angels were banished from Celestia and lost their minds and bodies.

customize.name: Seelie
customize.desc: Once a mighty race that lived to guide mankind. They have been cursed to degenerate into nothing but empty husks. They show those who follow them treasures hidden from human eyes.

customize.text: After their expulsion, the angels evolved into the Seelie â€” empty husks that lead adventurers to treasures.

First angel
The first angel was in the depths of the earth near a silver tree. When the Voyager from a distant world asked her about the most forbidden origins of the world and revealed her identity, the fetters laid upon her by the Primordial One broke apart, and she understood what it meant to serve herself. The first angel handed over the power of creation, which belonged to the lord of the firmaments, to mortals, and they created

customize.name: Fae
customize.desc: Followers of the first Cryo Archon, the Winter Tsar, who were created from the bones of giant beasts and fallen frostmoon light.

customize.text: . The angel and the Voyager fell in love with each other and decided to go against the laws established by the Heavenly Principles. For this betrayal, the first angel was stripped of her name and flesh, and all angels were cursed: If they dared gaze into another's eyes, and to one alone offer the love that was meant for all, then not only would their divine beauty crumble into the wind, but their minds would fall to dust, until from the fallen one's remains, a Seelie would rise, forever drifting in search of fading memories to consume.

customize.name: Yohualtecuhtin, Lord of the Night
customize.desc: An angel who created the Night Kingdom in Natlan.

customize.text: The Lord of the Night is an angel who created the

customize.name: Night Kingdom
customize.desc: The Lord of the Night designed a realm of souls and memories to recreate the damaged Ley Lines in Natlan. The Night Kingdom is a mysterious, liminal space between the body and mind, life and death, where the souls of all the dead Natlanese go.

customize.text:
in Natlan.
Sybilla
A seer who survived the first flood and lost her mind and body. Appears as a Golden Bee. Sybilla predicted
and sacrificed herself so that Remus could create the Great Symphony, Phobos.

customize.name: Nabu Malikata
customize.desc: The Goddess of Flowers, a friend of Greater Lord Rukkhadevata and King Deshret.

customize.text: Nabu Malikata is one of the few angels who retained her body and mind. She ruled Sumeru along with

customize.name: Al-Ahmar
customize.desc: The ruler of the Sumeru desert. He is also known as King Deshret.

customize.name: Rukkhadevata
customize.desc: The Goddess of Wisdom, the previous Dendro Archon, and a friend of Nabu Malikata and King Deshret. She was completely erased from Irminsul to save it from forbidden knowledge.

customize.name: Nicole
customize.desc: A prophetess and a member of the Hexenzirkel. She is also known as Nicole Reeyn and N. She is one of the last angels who remained conscious. She lost her voice and can only talk inside people's heads.

customize.text: Presumably, one of the angels who retained her body and mind but lost her voice. Nicole is also a member of the

customize.name: Hexenzirkel
customize.desc: A secret witch society, which discusses secrets at the tea parties and explores Irminsul. There are eight witches in the Hexenzirkel.

imgDesc.text: Heavenly envoys are helping the people of Sal Vindagnyr.
Angels are protecting Irminsul from the dragon's fire.
